Learn Mark Down

Mark Down Introduction

“Mark Donw Language : try to traslate plain text into HTML”

Symbols

  • *:italic,bold,unordered list
  • #:head one two three
  • []():link
  • [][]:reference
  • !:image
  • <:quote
  • 1,2,num:ordered list
  • empty line or two space :new line

####===== End ====
